item.title: Asking About Sand Dabs
item.description: Suppose that you started a new job and the first thing that awaited you was a vague request from the CEO: “I really want to know what people think about how to prepare sand dabs”.

item.title: Multiprocessing errors in PyTorch
item.description: When you get your own OS-specific errors you have to start wondering whether the mere act of programming on Windows is a mistake.

item.title: Tabular modeling with Kaggle: predicting blueberry harvest yield
item.description: A recent Kaggle competition was launched that asks users to predict harvest yields from wild blueberries growing in the hills and mountains of the Northeast.

item.title: Memory compression for large datasets
item.description: Pandas gains great speed from loading everything into RAM but it comes with the obvious constraint of how much has been installed.

item.title: Recommendation systems: exploring collaborative filtering with boardgame ratings
item.description: Recommendation systems are one of the applications of machine learning that have become so embedded in daily life that it can be surprising to consider them as even related to machine learning.

item.title: Tensor Refresher
item.description: Intro # Tensors are the foundational building blocks of machine learning and their nuances are worth spending some time on.

item.title: Tony Tran
item.description: Summary # Experienced data engineer: 9yrs Python & SQL, 3yrs Javascript.
